Workflow.Name: SetupWizard>GetCurrentEnvironment
Workflow.Description: This flow is triggered from the Setup Wizard and uses the workflow() expression in Power Automate to return the current environment ID to the app.
Workflow.BillingContext: [{"id":"admin_CoESetupWizardPreview","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"CoE Setup and Upgrade Wizard"}},{"id":"admin_SetupWIzardARMFeatures","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"Setup WIzard - ARM Features"}}]

Description.description: This flow is triggered from the Setup Wizard and uses the workflow() expression in Power Automate to return the current environment ID to the app.
